title: Himmelbeet Cafe
typeOfFood: Ovo, American, Pizza, Chinese, Indian, International, Italian, Thai, Mediterranean
description: A 100% vegan/vegetarian, seasonal, low waste restaurant. Uses fresh ingredients from the urban garden Himmelbeet, in which the restaurant is situated. Daily changing dishes & classics (flower-salads, self-picking-herbs-tea, soups, quiches & cakes, healthy food, fair trade-coffee and more. Offers cooking-workshops, garden dinner and brunch. Sit on ale-benches, deckchairs or pallet-seats in the middle of the garden.
